title: CT Log Mismatch
description: New cert appears for look‑alike wallet domain
rationale: CT logs show suspicious issuance for look‑alike domain.

title: Passkey Clone
description: Clone of wallet prompts passkey on different origin
rationale: Passkeys only work on original origin; wrong origin is phishing.

title: Device Binding Warning
description: Site asks to bind device key on unknown domain
rationale: Binding keys on untrusted domains is malicious.

title: Service Worker Trap
description: After visiting site
isPhishing: offline page persists and asks login
column6: Malicious service worker serving fake offline content.

title: Deep Link Hijack
description: Open‑in‑app link jumps to fake login
rationale: Deep link abuse can redirect to phishing.

title: Signed Exchange Official
description: App served via signed exchange on official site
rationale: SXG from official domain preserves integrity.

title: COOP/COEP Present
description: Headers isolate app shell

title: Open Redirect Kit
description: Multiple redirect hops land on look‑alike login

title: No‑Referrer Policy
description: Links use no‑referrer to avoid leakage

title: FIDO2 Only
description: Site enforces security keys on correct domain

title: Fake Update Modal
description: Modal urges browser update with download

title: OCSP Revoked
description: OCSP marks cert as revoked on site

title: Wallet Seed Request
description: Site asks to re‑enter seed phrase
rationale: Legitimate wallets never ask for seed online.

title: Admin Portal Exposure
description: Admin page on public internet without MFA

title: CORP Missing
description: Console shows blocked cross‑origin resource policy

title: PKCE Required
description: OAuth flow shows PKCE verifier

title: Homoglyph Login
description: Unicode confusable characters in domain

title: Passwordless Legit
description: Passkey prompt on official bank

title: SRI Pin Failure
description: Script hash mismatch alert on CDN

title: Referrer Stripping
description: Download page strips referrer for privacy

title: Attacker CDN Script
description: Unknown CDN serves login JS

title: DPoP Proof Required
description: API demands DPoP token

title: Attestation Dialog
description: Passkey attestation shows known vendor

title: Mirrored Wallet UI
description: Identical UI on .net instead of .com

title: Security Scan Paywall
description: Online scanner demands payment to fix threats

title: 3DS Challenge
description: Payment routed to bank 3‑D Secure on correct domain

title: QR Swap
description: Poster QR redirects to fresh domain with giveaway

title: Pinned Cert Change
description: App warns of pin mismatch
rationale: Potential attack or rotation; treat as risk.

title: Isolated Iframe
description: Login in sandboxed iframe allowlist

title: Malicious iFrame Overlay
description: Invisible overlay captures clicks

title: Fake Wallet Extension
description: Extension from random site requires broad perms

title: Store Extension Minimal
description: Extension from official store with minimal perms

title: Domain Fronting Mask
description: Observed SNI/Host mismatch to hide dest

title: HSTS Preload
description: Site on HSTS preload

title: Look‑alike Subdomain
description: accounts.brand‑secure.com vs accounts.brand.com

title: Trusted Payment PSP
description: Redirect to known PSP with EV cert

title: Fake Seal
description: Page shows copied trust badges linking nowhere
rationale: Faked badges common on phish pages.

title: CT Watch Alert
description: Monitoring flags cert for brand‑support.help

title: Clipboard Read Request
description: Login asks clipboard read permission

title: Strong CSP
description: App uses restrictive CSP

title: Noopener Present
description: External links use rel=noopener

title: Data URL Login
description: Login served via data: URL

title: Host Header Abuse
description: Login behind reverse proxy shows odd host

title: URL Shortener Preview
description: User previews short URL before clicking

title: Fake Support Chat
description: Chat asks for password

title: CT Revoked Chain
description: Intermediate cert shows revoked

title: Permissions‑Policy Least
description: Only required features allowed

title: Re‑Auth on New Device
description: Service re‑authenticates with passkey

title: Mirrored Brand Email
description: Login form embedded in email via HTML

title: Official Security Page
description: Vendor page explaining phishing risks
